explains: v. 修复，翻新（尤指建筑物）；使恢复活力

sentences.en: We had to renovate this after the lake overflowed its banks a couple of months ago and flooded the area.
sentences.cn: 几个月前，湖水漫过河岸，淹没了这个地区，我们不得不对它进行整修。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, this does not mean that modernization and new building should be discouraged in order to renovate and protect heritage buildings.
sentences.cn: 然而，这并不意味着为了翻新和保护遗产建筑而应打压现代化和新建。
